item.description:
Join RonPaulHQ to watch Ron Paul clean up at the first GOP presidential debate.

Remember the last time a candidate--from either party--ran on faithfulness to the Constitution? Neither do we! So come watch Dr. Paul confuse his competition with phrases like "Founding Fathers," "powers not granted," and "individual liberty."

NOTE: In order to make this easy on the proprieters of Murphy's, we need to get a good solid crowd there at the bar *early,* say 6:30 or 7pm. So come on down, grab a beer and have some dinner, and settle in to watch Dr. Paul remind the country what a Republican is supposed to sound like.
item.name: Debate Watching Party! (Manchester)
